summary.span: 提供一个基于角色的编程模型，该模型支持用于粗粒度数据流和管道任务的进程内消息传递。

span.span: Provides an actor-based programming model that supports in-process message passing for coarse-grained dataflow and pipelining tasks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [tpl-install-instructions](~/includes/tpl-install-instructions.md)] 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据流](/dotnet/standard/parallel-programming/dataflow-task-parallel-library)。For more information, see [Dataflow](/dotnet/standard/parallel-programming/dataflow-task-parallel-library).
